snippet: Even as women make headway in fields like law and business, and technology zooms along as one of the fastest-growing sectors of the economy, its doors remain virtually closed to women.
abstract: Twitter's initial public offering filing for its Wall Street debut lists only one woman among its top officials, including its board, investors and executive officers; highlights that even as women make headway in fields like law and business, fast-growing economic sector of technology continues to keep its doors virtually closed to women.
lead_paragraph: Even as women make headway in fields like law and business, and technology zooms along as one of the fastest-growing sectors of the economy, its doors remain virtually closed to women.

headline.main: Curtain Is Rising on a Tech Premiere With (as Usual) a Mostly Male Cast
headline.print_headline: Curtain Is Rising on a Tech Premiere With (as Usual) a Mostly Male Cast
